formatted_address: 60 Airport Blvd., #02-13 Terminal 2 Singapore Changi Airport, Singapore 819643
name: Guardian Beauty Store

reviews.text:
Had an awful experience with the cashier. We were given $15 vouchers from Malaysian Airlines due to a flight delay, but the cashier claimed they were only worth $5 (she kept the voucher with her). I didn’t question it at first, but when another voucher was scanned later, it correctly showed $15.
To make matters worse, I tried to purchase something for $4.75 and was told I couldn’t use the voucher unless the total was at least $5—which was also incorrect. Very disappointing service.
Pharmacist Amirul is truly a slow poke, can take ten minutes to process 3 telfast. Imagine the queue before and after me. Whole 25 mins spent waiting for simple prescription.

vicinity: 60 Airport Boulevard, #02-13 Terminal 2 Singapore Changi Airport
